Pre-Game Insights: West Indies has won the T20 World Cup title twice, in 2012 and 2016, but has been poor in recent times.
West Indies beat Australia in their only warm-up match, scoring 257-4 batting first and holding Australia to 227-7.
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies and Papua New Guinea have never clashed in a T20I match.
West Indies and Papua New Guinea will meet for the first time in the T20 World Cup on Sunday, June 2.
Others: West Indies vs Papua New Guinea will meet for the first time in the T20 World Cup on Sunday, June 2 at the Providence Stadium in Guyana.
The match will begin at 8:00 PM IST and 10:30 AM local time.
